name: domponent
description: Build components with the HTML you already have.

scripts.deploy: npm test && node clean.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && npm pack && cd examples/site && npm install && webpack --mode=production && cd ../../ && gh-pages -d examples/site/dist
scripts.e2e-prod: npm test && node clean.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && npm pack && cd examples/e2e && npm install && npm start
scripts.e2e-dev: node clean.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && npm pack && cd examples/e2e && npm install && npm run start:dev

author: tamb
